Package org.ggp.base.util.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloudGameRepository
    Cloud game repositories provide access to game resources stored on game repository servers on the web, while continuing to work while the user is offline through aggressive caching based on the immutability + versioning scheme provided by the repository servers.
    Game
    Game objects contain all of the relevant information about a specific game, like Chess or Connect Four.
    GameRepository
    Game repositories contain games, and provide two main services: you can query a repository to get a list of available games (by key), and given a key, you can look up the associated Game object.
    LocalGameRepository
    Local game repositories provide access to game resources stored on the local disk, bundled with the GGP Base project.
    LocalGameRepository.BaseRepository  
    LocalGameRepository.MetadataCompleter  
    RemoteGameRepository
    Remote game repositories provide access to game resources stored on game repository servers on the web.
    TestGameRepository
    Test game repository that provides rulesheet-only access to games with no associated metadata or other resources, to be used only for unit tests.
